patthana7.21:1.1: Naajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (2)
patthana7.21:2.1: Nabahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nabahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (2) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
